welcome.title: Welcome to QueueForRoom!
welcome.content: This is your school room reservation system. Let me show you around!

map.title: Room Map
map.content: Click here to view the interactive building map and reserve rooms.

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.content: Access your profile, reservations, and settings from this menu.

floors.title: Building Floors
floors.content: Switch between different floors to see all available rooms.

rooms.title: Room Selection
rooms.content: Click on any room to see details and make a reservation. Color coding shows room types and access levels.

permissions.title: Request Permissions
permissions.content: As a regular user, you need to request permission from instructors to reserve rooms. Go to your profile to request access.

viewOnly.title: View Room Availability
viewOnly.content: You can view all rooms and their availability. Once you receive permission, you can start booking rooms.

roomDetails.title: Room Details
roomDetails.content: Click on a room to see its details, capacity, and current reservations. You'll need permission to book rooms.

reservations.title: Your Reservations
reservations.content: As an instructor, you can create and manage room reservations. Click here to view all your bookings.

permissions.title: Two Permission Types
permissions.content: You may have two types of permissions: 1) Reserve Rooms - create your own bookings, 2) Override Reservations - modify or cancel others' bookings. Check with your admin if you need override permissions.

booking.title: Book a Room
booking.content: Click on an available room to create a reservation. You can set the time, add a description, and invite other users to your session.

dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
dashboard.content: As an administrator, you have full access to manage instructors, permissions, rooms, and system settings.

permissions.title: Manage Permissions
permissions.content: You can grant or revoke two types of permissions to instructors: reservation rights and override rights. Each permission is independent.

roomManagement.title: Full Room Access
roomManagement.content: You can view, modify, or cancel any reservation. You can also manage room properties, add new rooms, and configure the building layout.

settings.title: Notification Settings
settings.content: Customize your notification preferences in the Settings page. Control which emails you receive for reservations and permission changes.

theme.title: Theme Switcher
theme.content: Switch between light and dark themes in Settings. Your preference will be saved for future sessions.

finish.title: You're All Set!
finish.content: You can restart this tour anytime by clicking the ? button in the bottom-right corner. Happy booking!

menu.title: Menu
menu.content: Tap here to open the navigation menu. You can also swipe right from the left edge to open it.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.content: Tap here to see your notifications. You can also swipe left from the right edge to open the panel.
